item.title: [DISTRELEC-4206] LT - account creation B2B - VAt control process not always 12 positions
item.description:
LT - distrelec.lt
https://www.distrelec.lt/register/b2b

VAT code control process not ok
existing customer with a 11 positions VAT code
See screen shot
item.summary: LT - account creation B2B - VAt control process not always 12 positions

comments.comment:
As we just have been informed there are not only 12 digit VAT numbers in LT.
SAP validates the numbers.
We should remove the digit validator and inform the customer only about the wrong number.

VAT numbers in Lithuania are
9 or 12 digits.
Please modify the validator and the text on the fly out.
thx.

Done.

Jean-Wilfrid, when you test this ticket, can you also check that you can make a register for ch b2b and at b2b please?

Thank you

attachment.name: VAT code not always 12 positions - review control process.jpg
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4205] Credit Card page translations - LT
item.description:
On this page: https://test.distrelec.lt/checkout/payment

please use These translations

CCnr_label=Card Number-Kortelės numeris
creditcardholder_label=Card holder—Kortelės turėtojas
KKMonthYear_label=Valid until (MM/JJ)---Galioja iki (mėn/metai)
submitButton_label=Pay now---Mokėti dabar
securityCode_label=Security Code—Saugos kodas
creditcardholder_field_placeholder=First Name Last Name—Vardas Pavardė
securityCode_placeholder=CVC--CVC--Kortelės patvirtinimo kodas

comments.comment:
It looks like sevenval uploaded a wrong file.

I've uploaded the one from the SVN and it looks good now.

Please check with Seveval,
if their translations are missing now.
I checked and yes, they uploaded a wrong file.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4198] Top navigation - only 4 cathegories shown
item.description: please advice if we Change the word 'ir' into '&', will this work?

comments.comment:
Typekit seems not to be defined.
Could you please check.

Raphi,
Could you please verify if everything is defined correctly in Typkit for Distrelec.lt?
The wrong typekit gets loaded. I have to check this.

The problem was that the wrong URLs were defined in the local.properties. They are now already correct, but not yet deployed on P. So I have changed the values manually. Now the navigation gets displayed correctly and the the typekit gets loaded also correct.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4182] OrderHistory Converter Exception
item.description:
Hello

In the SapReadOrderResponseOrderHistoryConverter class we have this code : 

/** Payment */
if (readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode() != null) {
	// Setting payment mode and payment info NEED TO DISSCUSS Payment information coming from response
	try {
		final MovexPaymentModeModel distPaymentMode = (MovexPaymentModeModel) paymentOptionService
				.getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode());
		distOrderData.setPaymentMode(getDefaultDistPaymentModeConverter().convert(distPaymentMode));
	} catch (final Exception e) {
		LOG.warn(e.getMessage(), e);
	}
}

For all orders of my customer the distPaymentMode is always empty (""), in this case should we removed this code?

comments.comment: I am not sure that we should remove or disable this code for ever. We need to insure that always empty distPaymentMode is right ? i think it should have some value in the response. Please check with Francesco.

Yes, maybe we can test the value like this?

if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode())) {

Yes would be nice to add this check i thought 

paymentOptionService.getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode();

Might has placed all the checks but any ways to put and extra check doesn't cost anything. Also I would suggest you to open a new jira task and assign it to
Evangelos attach the request and response xml and ask him the reason why we have emptyString in distPaymentMode . Will be nice to double check if sap has some issue in that case.

We can close this bug after apply this check and open a new jira.

Hello

Test added. I have asked Evangelos who will investigate for the empty field.

Thank you Neeraj

You are welcome ☺

Neeraj Shandilya
Developer (E-Platform)
Elfa Distrelec
SE-175 80 Järfälla / Sweden
Tel. +46727659287(H)

From: Laurent Zamofing | Distrelec (JIRA) AutoMailer@namics.com
Sent: 23 May 2014 14:02
To: Shandilya, Neeraj
Subject: [jira.namics] (DISTRELEC-4182) OrderHistory Converter Exception

https://jira.namics.com/s/en_US-sjbl1-418945332/854/85/_/jira-logo-scaled.png

https://jira.namics.com/secure/useravatar?avatarId=10462Laurent Zamofing | Distrelec<https://jira.namics.com/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=lzamofing> commented on [Bug] DISTRELEC-4182<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4182>
OrderHistory Converter Exception<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4182>

Hello

Test added. I have asked Evangelos who will investigate for the empty field.

Thank you Neeraj

This message is automatically generated by JIRA.
If you think it was sent incorrectly, please contact your JIRA administrators
For more information on JIRA, see: http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira

Hello Neeraj

Since Evangelos resolved the SAP issue, we have a distPaymentMode but I had to change a little bit the code to this :

/** Payment */
if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode())) {
  // Setting payment mode and payment info NEED TO DISSCUSS Payment information coming from response
  try {
    final DistPaymentModeModel distPaymentMode = (DistPaymentModeModel) paymentOptionService
  	.getAbstractDistPaymentModeForErpPaymentModeCode(readOrderResponse.getPaymentMethodCode());
    distOrderData.setPaymentMode(getDefaultDistPaymentModeConverter().convert(distPaymentMode));
  } catch (final Exception e) {
    LOG.warn(e.getMessage(), e);
  }
}

Does you agree with this modification?
Now I can see in the order detail the name of the delivery option but not the payment option...

Yes Completely Agree.

Now you can remove this TODO comment

Thank you so much.
Done. Now we can see the delivery and payment method in the order history

Now the payment methode is missing in the order history.
User: distrelec.testing+lt1@gmail.com

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4173] Guest orders // order-number generation
item.description:
There seems to be a problem with the generation of order-numbers at guest-checkout. It takes longer than with normal orders and fails in most cases.

order: 0000501Q

Please check attached file.

comments.comment: Probably we should extend the time we wait until SAP is responding. I don't now how long the waiting time is now. I think we can discuss this with Florian/Jan how long we should wait. I can not see why it should take longer for a guest, than as for a normal user. Probably they do some special processes in SAP that takes more time. So probably we also have to take a look together with Evangelos.

Hi Evangelos,
Could you let us know why it takes longer for guest-orders? Thanks.

Hello Rafael,
I checked in SAP and the process time is exactly the same is for a registered customer. The problem seems to be somewhere else. I am nos sure who should check that.
Let's test it again once HP P talks to SAP P

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4159] LT - wrong calculation of prices in order history
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041
TS-24.72

https://test.distrelec.lt/my-account/order-history
https://test.distrelec.lt/my-account/order-history/order-details/0073634456

Login with distrelec.testing+lt8@gmail.com, pw: distrelec. Go to order history, open e.g. order 0073634456, total price 24,68. On order detail the price is wrong calculated in all orders. (img_104/105_lt_pzu)
item.summary: LT - wrong calculation of prices in order history

comments.comment: Hi evangelos, please consider the attached file.

Hello Ligia,
Could you please check that? Variant in Q LigiaPrice

Hi Evangelos,
I implemented the correction in D01. Please check.
BR, Ligia
The issue is still here. Can you re check?

Hi Evangelos,
Please test again. You can test directly in Q01.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hello Ligia,
I have exactly the same results. Its like the transport was never made. Please check and let me know.
As we discussed, this is fixed.

Hello Florian,
You can check that again?

Hi Neeraj
could you please verify if the issue has been fixed?

Hi, I can see now the correct prices and sum at the end. So it seems to be fine now.

Sorry i take my words back as Still it has the problem.

Attaching the request & response xml file.

Please have a look.
Please log in as distrelec.testing+lt8@gmail.com, pw: distrelec and check again. Order-no: 0073634484. (img_122_lt_pzu)
The right calculation should be like this

Webshop is not showing the freight costs which are included in the order and also sent in the interface.
Please check and correct. shippingPrice 17 as well as the tax amount on freight which is added in the VAT amount

Hi Francisco,

I am working from home today with very limited access. Nit able to access swt. Could it be possible for you to check why Shipping cost is not displayed on the orderreview page. I have checked this is coming in the soap response.

Thanks
looks fine in test system now.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4150] LT - No confirmation e-mail after ordering
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041
TS-32.44

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?tab=wm#inbox
https://test.distrelec.lt/checkout/orderConfirmation/00004TT9

Log in as distrelec.testing+lt2@gmail.com, pw: distrelec. Put an article into the cart, continue checkout process till the end, the confirmation page is showed, but no confirmation e-mail will be received. (img_98/99_lt_pzu)
item.summary: LT - No confirmation e-mail after ordering

comments.comment: In elfa countries, the confirmation emails will be sent by SAP. The hybris confirmation mails were deactivated today.
We should check this in P.
I agree that should be checked on P

Works on P.
To be tested.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4117] LT: Sitemap
item.description: Please send me the sitemap for the LT web shop.

comments.comment:
• Sitemap1.xml: OK
• Sitemap2.xml: OK
• Sitemap3.xml:
o all category pages (/c/) are WRONG, because they’re in German. Around 30’000. E.g.
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/Labor-Netzger%C3%A4te-%26-Elektronische-Lasten/Labor-Netzger%C3%A4te/Labornetzger%C3%A4te/Labornetzger%C3%A4te%2C-Manson-HCS-360x-USB/c/cat-360132
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Test-%26-Messtechnik/Oszilloskope-Generatoren-Kalibratoren-LCR-Messger%C3%A4te-Dekaden/c/cat-L2D_440848
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Komponenten/Passive-Bauelemente/Kondensatoren/Folienkondensatoren/Polypropylen-Kondensatoren/Folienkondensatoren-PHE450/2000-VDC/c/cat-43799

o There are CMS pages (/cms/) in there that do not work. Around 100.
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Settings-Payment-%26-Delivery-Options-Page/cms/payment-and-delivery-options
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Order-Confirmation-Approval-Page/cms/orderConfirmation
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Update-Forgotten-Password-Page/cms/updatePassword

o There are pages that to do not belong to LT:
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Spezialgesch%C3%A4fte/Gedruckte-Kataloge/Grosser-Katalog/Distrelec-Kataloge/Distrelec-Kataloge-in-deutscher-Sprache/c/cat-41934
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Spezialgesch%C3%A4fte/Gedruckte-Kataloge/Grosser-Katalog/Distrelec-Kataloge/Distrelec-Kataloge-in-franz%C3%B6sischer-Sprache/c/cat-41936
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Spezialgesch%C3%A4fte/Special-Italy/Special-Articles-Italy/c/cat-L2-3D_564305
 http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Spezialgesch%C3%A4fte/Special-Italy/Special-Articles-Italy/Articoli-di-fornitura/c/cat-392209

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3775] Page titles & Meta data text
item.description:
Here are some properties to translate:

Page titles:

  • product.page.title.buy=buy
    --> the product page page title should be in the format " {Product name}

    buy | Distrelec Switzerland"

  • page.title.online.shop=Online Shop
    --> the category page title should be in the format " {Category name}

    Online Shop | Distrelec Switzerland"

Meta Description:

  • meta.description.category=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! {0} kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the category description metadada

    * meta.description.homepage=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! Elektronik, Messtechnik, Computer kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the home page description metadata

    * meta.description.manufacturer=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! {0}

    kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the manufacturer description metadata

  • meta.description.product=Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! {0}

    kaufen im Distrelec Online Shop | We love electronics
    --> the product description metadata

comments.comment: some properties to translate
Salut Nabil, the translations for all rollouted countries and the new to be roll out LIT/NO/SV/DK?
these translations needs to be part of the next release, so we actually we need EN, DE, FR, IT and LT versions

Related tickets

  • DISTRELEC-3656
  • DISTRELEC-3780
Nabil, stp tu me rédis si le fichier est correct comme ça? Je comprends pas trop bien qu'est-ce que doit être traduit. Please check et rédis moi si c'est bon et on l'envoie en translation. Merci Stef
See comment and attachement. Thanks Stef
oui mais il manque les traductions , merci
Translations.
Translations in.
SE, NO & DK integrated in the base_*.properties
verified titles and meta tags for ch, looks fine.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3599] Newsletter registration
item.description:
Change „In welcher Industrie arbeiten Sie?" to: „In welchem Bereich sind Sie tätig?" (and change to mandatory field!)
In „Bitte wählen"-menu change:
o „MRO" to „Wartung, Reparatur & Instandhaltung"
o „R&D" to „Forschung & Entwicklung"
o „Verteiler" to „Distribution"
o „Privat" to „Privatkonsument"
o and „Andere" to „Anderer"

The rest will stay as it is. Thanks.

comments.comment:
Properties updated (ch and at)
DistNewsletterIndustry updated directly on the production and in /distrelecB2Binitialdata/resources/distrelecB2Binitialdata/import/project/common/newsletter_de.impex
The mandatory field will only take effect with the next deployment
status? which fix version?
The labels are changed on the production and the mandatory field is in the release 1.1.16.
verified.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3458] Optivo // signup, change profile
item.description: When you're logged in with a user and you want to change your subscription, you only have the choice yes or no in my account. We need the full featured newsletter signup form there with the different categories, industry etc.

comments.comment:
Done.
I have added the Industry field and SpecificTopic list in the newsletter form in myAccount.
If a customer has registred to the newsletter but has not validated with the double opt-in, the form will be as read only (also if he added during the register).

If the customer add during the register, all topics are selected.
Sorry for all status changes
verified

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4221] CH - No order number on confirmation page
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041

https://test.distrelec.ch/checkout/payment
https://test.distrelec.ch/checkout/orderConfirmation/000054GN

Not logged in, add a product in cart, order as guest, credit card data --> MasterCard, cardno: 5555555555554444, exp.date: 06.2015, Name: Hans Muster, checkno: 123. After press on button "Pay" the confirmation page will open but there is no order number available. In the mailbox the confirmation e-mail of the ordered product is received. E-mail access: distrelec.testing@gmail, pw: d1str313c. (01-03_ch_pzu)
item.summary: CH - No order number on confirmation page

comments.comment: @Francesco: It seems we enforce to have a logged-in user. The service sends the user to the login page (see screenshot).

Best Regards,

It looks now fine on the test system (used distrelec.testing+lt3@gmail.com).
